text:

text: By expanding the Earned Income Tax Credit and the Child Tax Credit, we can give millions more Americans a foothold in the middle class – and we can expand these credits by passing the #WorkingFamiles Tax Relief Act. https://t.co/7qI0ppWM7L

text: In Ohio, the #WorkingFamilies Tax Relief Act would put more money in the pockets of 4 million people, including 1.7 million children, by boosting the Earned Income Tax Credit and the Child Tax Credit. It would reward hard work and make sure no one is taxed into poverty. https://t.co/GBIxB7lPqi
label: D

text:
Republicans have repeatedly touted their tax law’s increase in the Child Tax Credit. But the reality is their tax law left out 26 million children in low- and moderate-income working families. 

The #WorkingFamilies Tax Relief Act ensures these kids get the support they deserve.
label: D

text: The cost of everything from health care to child care to prescription drugs is up, but wages are flat. We need to put more money in the pockets of hardworking people, and we can do that with #WorkingFamilies Tax Relief Act. https://t.co/oL89tYK75R
label: D

text: 4 in 10 Americans say they couldn’t afford an emergency expense of $400. The #WorkingFamilies Tax Relief Act gives people an alternative to predatory payday lenders by allowing workers to draw a $500 advance payment on their Earned Income Tax Credit.
label: D

text: More and more people are seeing the #GOPTaxScam for what it was – a handout to millionaires & billionaires at the expense of working families. It's time that we actually put more money in the pockets of working people, and we can do that with the #WorkingFamilies Tax Relief Act. https://t.co/965gi6S9eK

text:
